---
title: "Gapminder Quiz"
---

The Gapminder dataset contains data about 142 different countries recorded over a 55 year span; the columns include country, continent, year, life expectancy, poulation and GDP per capita.

This website contains a comparison between [Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita](https://romeouni.github.io/qtm350-quiz02/life-gdp)

This website also contains a comparison between [Life Expectancy and Population](https://romeouni.github.io/qtm350-quiz02/life-population)

Finally, there is a page tracking several indicators measured in India over time at [Country Analysis](https://romeouni.github.io/qtm350-quiz02/country)
